Articles.Content:
Thread is under development

 

Hello everyone!

Have you ever watched Scotts Galileos Conquest and though. I wanna try play better than Scott with same mods? Well, problem was that Scott haven't released he's final modpack list, he is only given us what looks like inside he's gamedata folder, so from that information and also watching series i have found almost all mods that Scott plays with.

 

 

If you find incorrect or something wrong with in this mod pack or missing mod, please let me know.

CKAN install

1. Install ckan and download ckan file HERE

2. Install mods that does not install from CKAN

Spoiler

KSC floodlight http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/122175-105-ksc-floodlight-24022016/

Modular Flight Integrator http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/106369-12-modularflightintegrator-123-december-11th/

Docking camera (KURS style) http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/124475-121-docking-camera-kurs-style-v-1211-18nov16/

Outer Planets Mod http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/93999-121-outer-planets-mod-21-biome-overhaul-more-biomes-more-interesting-names-better-looking-etc-17-nov/

RoverScience http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/67979-121-roverscience-revisted-220-better-interactive-science-for-rovers/

VaporVent http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/146847-12-vapor-vent-released/

Galileos Planet Pack http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/152136-122-galileos-planet-pack-official-release-v11/

HooliganLabs airship http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/49443-airships-in-12-hooliganlabs-mods/

 

 

3. Run KSP as 64x

 

Modpack file- Disabled for now -Modlist is here

Spoiler

I could not add all mods to this one pack, because some of them got All Rights Reserved license or confusing license, but i am going to ask those mod owners to give right to include their mods. 

So, Here is the list: 

 

[X]Science CC-BY-NC-SA-4.0 Has been made by: @Z-Key Aerospace  http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/107661-ksp-122-x-science-ksp-science-report-and-checklist-v54/
Toolbar BSD 2 Clause Has been made by: @blizzy78 http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/55420-120-toolbar-1713-common-api-for-draggableresizable-buttons-toolbar/
B9 Aerospace Procedural Wings  CC-BY-NC-SA-4.0 https://archive.org/details/B9-PWings-Fork-1-0.40.9
B9 Part Switch LGPL 3.0 Has been made by: @blowfish http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/140541-122-b9partswitch-v171-feb-5-switch-fuels-models-nodes-and-more/
Minimum Ambient Lighting BSD License Has been made by: @Red3Tango And he has given license to distribute MAL http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/61425-12x-minimum-ambient-lighting-v123/

 

----------------LINE FOR MYSELF CHECK WHERE I AM GOING---------------------

And here is the mods that does not include inside modpack, but Scott uses them. So you have to download them manually.

 

HooliganLabs airship All Rights Reserved http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/49443-airships-in-12-hooliganlabs-mods
Tweakable Everythinghttp://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/58773-12-tweakableeverything-116-beta-for-all-your-part-tweaking-needs/

Unmanned before mannedhttp://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/95645-12x-seti-unmanned-before-manned-patreon/
SETI prode Parts http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/95645-12x-seti-unmanned-before-manned-patreon/

Stockalike Station Parts Expansion http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/155480-122-stockalike-station-parts-expansion-jan-23/

Stock Visual Enchancements CC BY-NC-ND http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/143288-122-113-stock-visual-enhancements-116-1083/

Galileos CC BY-NC-ND http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/152136-122-galileos-planet-pack-official-release-v11/

Make backup of your ksp, before installing.

[Download link is going to be back when i update mods and fix license issues!]

How to install: 

  1. Download modpack
  2. Unrar it
  3. Place all folders inside gamedata folder
  4. MAKE SURE YOU LAUNCH KSP x64!

It can take sometime to launch, because this is pretty huge modpack. 

IF THERE IS ANY PROBLEM WITH LICENSES, PLEASE TELL ME SO I CAN FIX IT!

 

I want to say BIG THANKS for all modders, who have made these awesome mods!

This modpack is tested on KSP 1.2.2 on Windows 10 platform.
 

 

 

 

 

Edited March 10, 2017 by SolidJuho
CKAN file is now live. Modpack coming soon

This is awesome!

Thanks for putting this together!

can you explain the bug, I don't understand (haven't tried it yet, at work)

Well @SolidJuho, I have some bad news for you...

In his latest episode (#9), Scott said that he updated his game to 1.2.2, and "apparently didn't grab quite the same mods", to quote him. As an example, one thing I can see in that episode, at about 15:43 and onwards, is that there's a piece from Stockalike Station Parts Expansion visible. Which you don't have in your list above.

9 hours ago, Streetwind said:

Well @SolidJuho, I have some bad news for you...

In his latest episode (#9), Scott said that he updated his game to 1.2.2, and "apparently didn't grab quite the same mods", to quote him. As an example, one thing I can see in that episode, at about 15:43 and onwards, is that there's a piece from Stockalike Station Parts Expansion visible. Which you don't have in your list above.

Thanks for info. I added it to manual install, because All Rights Rerved.
Another thing is that i am not going to make ckan install file, because there was too many mods and it could not apply changes. Bug?

Thanks @SolidJuho for the Modpack and of course thanks to all the Modmakers.

 

Does anybody know which Mod includes the Cupola Module with those shields and the beautiful Command-Pod Scott used in EP9?

 

Edit: Had some issues with the mod pack, but the list is helpful. 

Edited March 17, 2017 by Physics Student

So are you just redistributing entire mods? Perhaps the proper thing for you to have done is ask permission before doing so even if the license allows you to. I for one, do not want any of my mods included in this pack. Mod packs like this are redundant and I also can guarantee you will not be prepared/willing to deal with the flow of bug reports headed your way. I highly recommend you remove the download and include just a list of Manleys mods with links. @sal_vager recently dealt with same issue with another mod pack and will likely tell you the same.

so with that being said, please remove GPP from this pack. 

I would also recommend you tag the other mod devs whose mods you redistribute and see what their stance on it is. I'll let you know now, mods packs are generally frowned upon. Lists however, are encouraged.

Edited March 4, 2017 by Galileo

@SolidJuho, it appears you have included several mods that do not permit derivatives or redistribution of the whole mod, including them in a pack creates a derivative work.

 

Quote

NoDerivatives — If you remix, transform, or build upon the material, you may not distribute the modified material.

 

These are:

Environmental Visual Enhancements sorry, this is MIT
Galileo's planet pack, no distribution.
Firespitter, can't be redistributed in full without permission.
Kronal Vessel Viewer, technically it's all rights reserved public domain.
Stock Visual Enhancements, no distribution.

 

They cannot be included without permission, and Galileo is unlikely to give it.

I'll have to remove the download link as per the forums addon rules, sorry, I suggest you work on a ckan script as modpacks are highly disliked amongst the KSP modding community due to the issues they cause with outdated mods being in circulation and with issues arising from being part of a pack that do not occur with a supported download.

On 20/2/2017 at 2:22 PM, SolidJuho said:

Reentry Particle Effect GPL V2 http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/143040-12-reentry-particle-effect-11-2016-10-24/

Only the source code for Reentry Particle Effect is GPL V2. The mod's download is ARR, and shouldn't be included in this pack:

Download packages, art and sound assets, binaries and libraries licensed All Rights Reserved.

1 minute ago, pizzaoverhead said:

Only the source code for Reentry Particle Effect is GPL V2. The mod's download is ARR, and shouldn't be included in this pack:

I knew that first version did not got all licenses right and there slipped in some ARR and ND mods, so that is why i am rechecking all mods and if found ARR or ND stuff i am going to ask permissions for them or i am going to make them manual install ones. License recheck is still in progress and i haven't yet come across your mod, so that is why i haven't contacted you yet.

I am not going to release new version until modpack rules are more like finished, than right now. So far it look like they won't be banned.


I am sorry @pizzaoverhead that your mod slipped in.

1 minute ago, SolidJuho said:

I knew that first version did not got all licenses right and there slipped in some ARR and ND mods, so that is why i am rechecking all mods and if found ARR or ND stuff i am going to ask permissions for them or i am going to make them manual install ones. License recheck is still in progress and i haven't yet come across your mod, so that is why i haven't contacted you yet.

I am not going to release new version until modpack rules are more like finished, than right now. So far it look like they won't be banned.


I am sorry @pizzaoverhead that your mod slipped in.  

That's no problem. This is a pretty big endeavour, and will likely take a few attempts to do right Good luck with your pack!
CKAN file is now live. Modpack file is coming soon. Maybe
